aboutData.title: Hi There! I'm Davit Spanderashvili
aboutData.subtitle: Web Developer
aboutData.text: I am a Web Developer who seeks improvment and focused on discipline with 4 years of experience. I specialize in creating responsive, user-friendly websites and thrive on solving challenges with clean, efficient code. With a passion for continuous learning and a commitment to best practices, I deliver reliable, high-quality solutions. Let‚Äôs build something great together!

services.title: Front-End
services.text: I‚Äôll join your team to handle all front-end tasks, delivering a pixel-perfect product that mirrors the design. Using modern practices, I‚Äôll ensure the code is clean, scalable, and ready to grow with your project‚Äôs future needs.

services.title: UI/UX Collaboration Package
services.text: I‚Äôll work closely with the R&D team and UI/UX designer to develop the best possible design focusing on OG idea, ensuring a seamless and user-centered experience across all platforms.

services.title: Responsive Design
services.text: I‚Äôll ensure your website looks and functions flawlessly across all devices, using flexible layouts and modern techniques for a seamless experience on desktops, tablets, and smartphones.

services.title: Contract: Full-Stack and SEO Package
services.text: A two-person team will cover both front-end and back-end development, ensuring smooth integration between the UI and server-side. Additionally, we‚Äôll implement SEO optimization to enhance visibility and performance, delivering a complete, efficient, and scalable solution tailored to your project‚Äôs needs.

services.title: Contract: Web and Mobile Package
services.text: I‚Äôll develop cohesive web and mobile applications that provide a seamless and intuitive user experience across all platforms. Utilizing responsive design principles, I ensure that your website and mobile app adapt beautifully to various screen sizes, from desktops to tablets and smartphones.

services.title: Contract: Project
services.text: Our dedicated team, including front-end and back-end developers, a mobile developer, a project manager, a UI/UX designer, and an SEO specialist, will collaboratively manage every aspect of your project. From initial design to final deployment, we ensure a seamless, high-quality product that meets your goals, enhances visibility, and exceeds expectations.

I‚Äôm excited to join a team that values innovation and excellence ‚Äî let‚Äôs discuss how I can contribute to your projects! üì¨

informations.title: Giorgi Akobia
informations.text: The website for farmway.ge is exactly what we needed. Davit was responsive, professional, and easy to work with. We‚Äôre thrilled with the result and highly recommend their services!

informations.title: Nika Urushadze
informations.text: The new wilbour.com perfectly reflects our brand‚Äôs identity and vision. Davit made the entire process seamless, balancing creativity with functionality. Their attention to detail and quick turnaround on feedback made a big difference.

informations.title: Anrew Handerson
informations.text: During Davit‚Äôs time with us at Nomad Capitalist, they played a key role in maintaining and refining our website, nomadcapitalist.com. Their attention to detail ensured the site ran smoothly, with improvements that enhanced performance and usability.

informations.title: Vako Turnava
informations.text: Davit led a pivotal project with us at Sweeft Digital, making Apple Pay accessible in Georgia for the first time. Their leadership, technical skill, and problem-solving abilities were instrumental in delivering this groundbreaking solution on time and with great precision.

informations.title: Beka Khopheria
informations.text: Working with Davit on our website was a fantastic experience. They delivered a beautifully designed, creative site that perfectly captures the essence of sales at our construction development projects.

informations.title: Piotr Piasecki MBA
informations.text: Davit made a significant impact during their time with us at Revenue Capital by completely redesigning our website. Their vision and creativity transformed our online presence, resulting in a modern, user-friendly site that effectively communicates our services and brand identity.

experience.title: Wordpress
experience.subTitle: Farmway
experience.text: I developed Farmway.ge, a comprehensive agricultural platform offering project planning, irrigation solutions, and agro-consultation services. The goal was to build a modern, responsive site that showcases the company‚Äôs capabilities‚Äîlike super-intensive almond orchards, greenhouses, and advanced drip irrigation. The project required seamless integration of multiple service sections, cross-browser compatibility, and scalability to support future updates. The result is a user-friendly experience that not only informs but also helps customers access financial support for agricultural projects through grants and loans.

experience.title: Wordpress
experience.subTitle: Wilbour Holding
experience.text: I developed Wilbour.com, the digital hub for Wilbour Holding LLC, showcasing their diverse ventures across retail, hospitality, advertising, and more. The challenge was to design a sleek, responsive site that effectively reflects their innovative mindset and multi-industry presence. The site highlights subsidiaries like the Tiflis Opera aparthotel, the Giggles retail chain, and custom B2B services, providing a seamless experience for both clients and visitors. Built with scalability in mind, the platform is designed to support future growth as Wilbour continues to expand its portfolio.

experience.title: Wordpress / React.js
experience.subTitle: Nomad Capitalist
experience.text: I joined the Nomad Capitalist team to support and maintain their existing website, ensuring it remained smooth, secure, and up-to-date. My role involved troubleshooting issues, optimizing performance, and implementing new features to enhance user experience. The platform serves a global clientele by offering offshore consulting services, including tax strategies, second citizenship, and asset protection. I worked on maintaining the blog, podcast, and service pages, ensuring scalability to handle future updates as the business grows. Through ongoing support, I‚Äôve helped keep the site aligned with Nomad Capitalist‚Äôs mission of empowering entrepreneurs to ‚Äúgo where they‚Äôre treated best.‚Äù

experience.title: Next.js / React.js / Vercel
experience.subTitle: Sweeft Digital | A Making Science Company
experience.text: I developed the web version of Keepz, a versatile point-of-sale (POS) solution that streamlines business operations across industries like restaurants, beauty salons, supermarkets, and delivery services. My focus was on ensuring the web platform provides a seamless user experience, mirroring the app‚Äôs core features, such as tracking transactions and spending in one place. This project emphasized efficient financial management without relying on third-party integrations, offering businesses a smooth and unified process for payments and record-keeping. The challenge was to maintain the app‚Äôs functionality across web environments while ensuring fast performance and easy cross-platform synchronization

experience.title: Next.js / React.js / Vercel
experience.subTitle: Apart Development
experience.text: Joined the development team to support and enhance the functionality of Apart Group‚Äôs website‚Äîa hub for luxury residential projects and investment opportunities. My role focused on refining the user interface, optimizing performance, and ensuring a smooth experience across devices. The platform provides property details, including commercial and residential listings, and integrates investment tools, making it an essential resource for real estate buyers and investors. My contributions also involved troubleshooting, maintenance, and keeping the site up to date with the latest developments and customer needs

experience.title: Wordpress
experience.subTitle: Revenue Capital
experience.text: I joined the development team to redesign the platforms for Revenue Capital and Revenue Coin, focusing on improving user experience, performance, and scalability. Both projects are part of an innovative ecosystem aimed at funding startups and rewarding investors through token-based economies. Revenue Capital functions as an investment platform, offering growth capital to promising startups in exchange for a share in their future revenue. My work involved refining the front-end experience, ensuring seamless access to project information, and building a secure interface for users to explore and manage their investments. Revenue Coin complements the platform by serving as a utility token, allowing users to invest in startups and participate in the platform‚Äôs ecosystem. I redesigned the site to better communicate how $RVC works, making the token mechanics and potential rewards easier to understand for both investors and startups. The updates included responsive design improvements and optimized performance to support high traffic during token-related events and platform growth. These redesign efforts helped align both sites with a unified, user-friendly design language, ensuring they work together to attract investors and empower new businesses
